long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful AI image processing technology, one click image cutout, removal of image background, and replacement of image background.

An AI image cutout software developed based on AI intelligent image processing technology.

With the continuous development of artificial intelligence technology, more and more intelligent applications are widely used in our lives. In the field of image processing, artificial intelligence technology is gradually becoming popular. In the past, removing and replacing image backgrounds required tedious operations. But now, with this intelligent extension, it is easy to perform batch cutout operations.

Are you still learning Photoshop cutout and searching for tutorials on beautiful images? In the era of artificial intelligence, we no longer need to rely on manual drawing to express our creativity and imagination, but can rely on intelligent technology to express our ideas faster and more efficiently.

👉 Main functions:
1. One click removal of background
One click removal of characters, objects, seals, etc., without the need to master PS technology, one click removal of images.
2. Change the background color of the ID photo and extract the image online
No need to label foreground and background, intelligent AI automatically recognizes cutout areas, removes image backgrounds with one click, and immediately generates PNG images with transparent backgrounds.
3. One click generation of product white background image
E-commerce platforms have strict upload standards for product images, with a white background being one of the most common requirements. With the help of image cutout tools, you can quickly remove the background in the image and generate a white background image of the product.
4. Free replacement of background color for ID photos
You don't have to go to a photo studio, you can change the background color of your ID photos by yourself. Use a cutout tool to remove the background of the ID photo. Click on the new image background, select a color from the color palette, and re color the background of the ID photo.
5. Super simple portrait cutout
No need to download software, no need for complex operations, one click can automatically complete portrait cutout. Click on cutout and wait a few seconds to get a portrait photo with a clean background.

👉 How to use:
AI removes image background:
1. Open the browser plugin, select the image that needs to remove the background, and the image background will be automatically removed.
long.zh_CN:
强大的AI图像处理技术，一键抠图、去除图片背景、更换图片背景。

基于AI智能图片处理技术，打造的AI抠图软件。

随着人工智能技术的不断发展，越来越多的智能应用正在我们的生活中广泛应用。在图片处理领域，人工智能技术也逐渐流行起来。在过去，移除图片背景和替换图片背景需要繁琐的操作。但现在，有了这个智能扩展，只需轻松的操作，就能批量完成抠图的操作。

你还在学习ps抠图么，还在四处寻找美图秀秀教程么？在人工智能时代，我们不再需要依靠手工绘图来表达我们的创造力和想象力，而是可以依靠智能技术来更快、更高效地表达我们的创意。

👉主要功能：
1.一键移除背景
人物、物体、印章等一键抠除，无需掌握PS技术，一键抠图。
2.证件照换底色，在线抠图
无需标注前景背景，智能AI自动识别抠图区域，一键删除图片背景，立即生成有透明背景的PNG图片。
3.一键生成商品白底图
电商平台对商品主图有着严格的上传规范，白色背景是最常见的要求之一。借助抠图工具，你可以快速删除图片中的背景，生成商品白底图。
4.免费给证件照换底色
不用去照相馆，自己就能给证件照换背景色。使用抠图工具，删除证件照的背景。点击新的图片背景，在调色板中选择一个颜色，重新为证件照背景着色。
5.超级简单的人像抠图
无需下载软件，无需复杂操作，一键就能自动完成人像抠图。点击抠图，稍等几秒，你就可以得到有干净背景的人像照片。

👉如何使用：
AI移除图片背景：
1.打开浏览器插件，选择需要去除背景的图片，便可自动移除图片背景。
